item.description:
Welcome to the new year with WordPress! This month we have Ed Gray leading a session on BuddyPress. He'll lead us through learning what BuddyPress is and how to use it, why you'd want to use it, and how to work with it - what plugins you can use, and how to handle themes.

We'll also be playing WordPress Jeopardy, since we didn't have enough attendance last month. So study up on your WordPress trivia!

View recaps of past meetups on our website, and listen for announcements via twitter, @valleysummit.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: January WordPress: BuddyPress
